meanings.definition: The leaf or leaflike part of a palm, fern, or similar plant.
meanings.sent1: The fronds of the palm tree swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: She admired the lush green fronds of the fern in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the fronds as a hiding spot for its acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a jungle of thoughts, each frond representing a different idea.
meanings.sent5: The fronds of the fern looked like delicate fingers reaching towards the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The fronds of the giant fern were as big as umbrellas.
meanings.sent2: He marveled at the intricate patterns on the fronds of the palm tree.
meanings.sent3: The fronds of the plant were so big, they could be used as makeshift fans.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the fronds of the trees created a canopy of shade.
meanings.sent5: The fronds of the ancient tree whispered secrets of the past.
